overview:
Morten Matras is an experienced entrepreneur and software developer with vast experience in how to create and run a WEB startup company successfully.

Morten has shown that working from the following value-set makes sense:

1) Be thrustworthy 2) Create value for people around you 3) Think forward 4) Work hard - and smart 5) Your value is your network

Currently Morten works as a CEO of LeadDoubler.com, a company specialized in online lead generation. The company has developed a specifically targeted software platform that through intelligent forms capture and handles leads.

Before this Morten was co-founding and the main architect behind RedAntenna.com - now SocialViper.com.
